channel.title: [PI] Overloads in wild? Having a little problem!

item.title: [PI] Overloads in wild? Having a little problem!
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

Hey guys, I dont want overloads to be allowed in the wild so I’ve added this:

public void doOverload(int itemId, int replaceItem, int slot) { if (c.inWild()) return;

So now, the overloads can’t be used in wild so that worked! However I can still just overload outside of the wild and than after that run into the wild and still have the 125 stats, does anyone know how to make the stats reset when you run or teleport into the wild?

thank you.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Overloads in wild? Having a little problem!
